languages.text: ...уже вернувшись на мостик своего корабля, Вольный Торговец бросил{mf||а} последний взгляд на бесконечную черноту и остов "Рожденного в огне", угадывающийся в ней. В этот миг ожили корабельные орудия, расцвечивая тьму залпами. И вскоре печальное проклятое судно превращается в яркую взвесь расплавленного металла и плазмы. Ибо то, что рождено в огне, в огне же и должно сгинуть...

...after returning to the bridge of {mf|his|her} ship, the Rogue Trader cast a final glance at the endless blackness and the shell of the Fireborn that lurked within it. In that moment, the ship's weapons batteries roared into life, lighting up the darkness with a barrage of fire. And the sad cursed vessel was soon turned into a brilliant mass of molten metal and plasma. For that which was born in fire should also perish in fire...
languages.original_text: ...уже вернувшись на мостик своего корабля, Вольный Торговец бросил{mf||а} последний взгляд на бесконечную черноту и остов "Рожденного в огне", угадывающийся в ней. Ибо то, что рождено в огне, в огне же и должно сгинуть...

traits.locale_text: ...after returning to the bridge of {mf|his|her} ship, the Rogue Trader cast a final glance at the endless blackness and the shell of the Fireborn that lurked within it. In that moment, the ship's weapons batteries roared into life, lighting up the darkness with a barrage of fire. And the sad cursed vessel was soon turned into a brilliant mass of molten metal and plasma. For that which was born in fire should also perish in fire...

...after returning to the bridge of {mf|his|her} ship, the Rogue Trader cast a final glance at the endless blackness and the shell of the Fireborn that lurked within it. In that moment, the ship's weapons batteries roared into life, lighting up the darkness with a barrage of fire. And the sad cursed vessel was soon turned into a brilliant mass of molten metal and plasma. For that which was born in fire should also perish in fire...

languages.text: ... tras regresar al puente de su nave, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente miró por última vez a la oscuridad infinita y al cascarón de la Nacida del Fuego que acechaba en su interior. Al momento, las baterías de armas de la nave cobraron vida, iluminando las tinieblas con fuego. La triste nave maldita pronto quedó reducida a un amasijo de metal fundido y plasma. Al fin y al cabo, lo nacido del fuego debe morir en el fuego...
languages.original_text: ...after returning to the bridge of {mf|his|her} ship, the Rogue Trader cast a final glance at the endless blackness and the shell of the Fireborn that lurked within it. In that moment, the ship's weapons batteries roared into life, lighting up the darkness with a barrage of fire. And the sad cursed vessel was soon turned into a brilliant mass of molten metal and plasma. For that which was born in fire should also perish in fire...

traits.locale_text: ... tras regresar al puente de su nave, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente miró por última vez a la oscuridad infinita y al cascarón de la Nacida del Fuego que acechaba en su interior. Al momento, las baterías de armas de la nave cobraron vida, iluminando las tinieblas con fuego. La triste nave maldita pronto quedó reducida a un amasijo de metal fundido y plasma. Al fin y al cabo, lo nacido del fuego debe morir en el fuego...

languages.text: ……行商浪人回到飞船的舰桥之后，朝无尽的黑暗，以及“烈焰之子”的残躯投去了最后一眼。随后，舰船上炮火轰鸣，一连串的火光照亮了眼前的黑暗。而那艘遭到诅咒的悲惨舰船，也很快在耀眼的烈焰之中，变成了一团熔化的金属与等离子体。在烈焰中诞生的造物，也应当在烈焰之中消亡……
languages.original_text: ...after returning to the bridge of {mf|his|her} ship, the Rogue Trader cast a final glance at the endless blackness and the shell of the Fireborn that lurked within it. In that moment, the ship's weapons batteries roared into life, lighting up the darkness with a barrage of fire. And the sad cursed vessel was soon turned into a brilliant mass of molten metal and plasma. For that which was born in fire should also perish in fire...

traits.locale_text: ……行商浪人回到飞船的舰桥之后，朝无尽的黑暗，以及“烈焰之子”的残躯投去了最后一眼。随后，舰船上炮火轰鸣，一连串的火光照亮了眼前的黑暗。而那艘遭到诅咒的悲惨舰船，也很快在耀眼的烈焰之中，变成了一团熔化的金属与等离子体。在烈焰中诞生的造物，也应当在烈焰之中消亡……

languages.text: …自分のブリッジに戻った後、自由開拓者は果てしなく続く暗闇とその中に潜むファイアボーンの船体を最後にチラリと見た。その瞬間、船の砲台が轟音を立てて命を吹き込み、集中砲火が暗闇を照らす。そして、その悲しい呪われた器はあっという間に、輝く溶融金属とプラズマの塊と化した。火の中で生まれたものは、火の中で滅びることになっているのだ…
languages.original_text: ...after returning to the bridge of {mf|his|her} ship, the Rogue Trader cast a final glance at the endless blackness and the shell of the Fireborn that lurked within it. In that moment, the ship's weapons batteries roared into life, lighting up the darkness with a barrage of fire. And the sad cursed vessel was soon turned into a brilliant mass of molten metal and plasma. For that which was born in fire should also perish in fire...

traits.locale_text: …自分のブリッジに戻った後、自由開拓者は果てしなく続く暗闇とその中に潜むファイアボーンの船体を最後にチラリと見た。その瞬間、船の砲台が轟音を立てて命を吹き込み、集中砲火が暗闇を照らす。そして、その悲しい呪われた器はあっという間に、輝く溶融金属とプラズマの塊と化した。火の中で生まれたものは、火の中で滅びることになっているのだ…

languages.text: ... nach der Rückkehr auf die Brücke {mf|seines Schiffs warf der Freihändler|ihres Schiffs warf die Freihändlerin} einen letzten Blick auf die endlose Schwärze und die Hülle der Fireborn, die darin lauerte. In diesem Moment erwachten die Waffenbatterien des Schiffs zum Leben und erhellten die Dunkelheit mit einer Salve aus Feuer. Und bald wurde aus aus dem traurigen, verfluchten Schiff eine leuchtende Masse aus geschmolzenem Metall und Plasma. Denn was im Feuer geboren wird, soll auch im Feuer vergehen ...
languages.original_text: ...after returning to the bridge of {mf|his|her} ship, the Rogue Trader cast a final glance at the endless blackness and the shell of the Fireborn that lurked within it. In that moment, the ship's weapons batteries roared into life, lighting up the darkness with a barrage of fire. And the sad cursed vessel was soon turned into a brilliant mass of molten metal and plasma. For that which was born in fire should also perish in fire...

traits.locale_text: ... nach der Rückkehr auf die Brücke {mf|seines Schiffs warf der Freihändler|ihres Schiffs warf die Freihändlerin} einen letzten Blick auf die endlose Schwärze und die Hülle der Fireborn, die darin lauerte. In diesem Moment erwachten die Waffenbatterien des Schiffs zum Leben und erhellten die Dunkelheit mit einer Salve aus Feuer. Und bald wurde aus aus dem traurigen, verfluchten Schiff eine leuchtende Masse aus geschmolzenem Metall und Plasma. Denn was im Feuer geboren wird, soll auch im Feuer vergehen ...

languages.text: ... De retour sur la passerelle de son vaisseau, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} lança un dernier regard vers la carcasse du Flamboyant qui flottait dans l'infinité obscure de l'espace. Soudain, les batteries d'armes s'animèrent en grondant, et un barrage de tirs perfora les ténèbres. En un instant, le vaisseau maudit fut réduit en une masse éclatante de métal fondu et de plasma, flamboyant une dernière fois avant de s'éteindre pour toujours...
languages.original_text: ...after returning to the bridge of {mf|his|her} ship, the Rogue Trader cast a final glance at the endless blackness and the shell of the Fireborn that lurked within it. In that moment, the ship's weapons batteries roared into life, lighting up the darkness with a barrage of fire. And the sad cursed vessel was soon turned into a brilliant mass of molten metal and plasma. For that which was born in fire should also perish in fire...

De retour sur la passerelle de son vaisseau, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} lança un dernier regard vers la carcasse du Flamboyant qui flottait dans l'infinité obscure de l'espace. En un instant, le vaisseau maudit fut réduit en une masse éclatante de métal fondu et de plasma, flamboyant une dernière fois avant de s'éteindre pour toujours...

languages.text: Kendi gemisinin köprüsüne dönen Hür Tacir, uçsuz bucaksız karanlıkta süzülen Ateşten'in boş kabuğuna son bir defa baktı. O anda geminin silah bataryaları canlanıp ateşten bir set, sonsuz karanlığı aydınlattı. Acınası ve lanetli bu gemi; erimiş metal ve plazmadan oluşan, azametli bir yığına dönüşüverdi. Nitekim ateşten doğan, ateşin içinde zail olmalıdır...
languages.original_text: ...after returning to the bridge of {mf|his|her} ship, the Rogue Trader cast a final glance at the endless blackness and the shell of the Fireborn that lurked within it. In that moment, the ship's weapons batteries roared into life, lighting up the darkness with a barrage of fire. And the sad cursed vessel was soon turned into a brilliant mass of molten metal and plasma. For that which was born in fire should also perish in fire...

traits.locale_text: Kendi gemisinin köprüsüne dönen Hür Tacir, uçsuz bucaksız karanlıkta süzülen Ateşten'in boş kabuğuna son bir defa baktı. O anda geminin silah bataryaları canlandı ve ateşten bir set, sonsuz karanlığı aydınlattı. Acınası ve lanetli bu gemi, kısa sürede erimiş metal ve plazmadan oluşan, azametli bir yığına dönüştü. Nitekim ateşten doğanın kaderi, ateşin içinde sonlanmalıdır…
